panels.description: Overall trade readiness: 1 = all high-level conditions OK (zone, gate, delta, risk), 0 = blocked.
panels.title: Trade readiness (now)

panels.description: Active zone from signal_zone (buy_band / neutral / sell_band). Uses topk(1, signal_zone) so that the label of the active zone is shown.
panels.title: Zone (current)

panels.description: OPEN = trading allowed; CLOSED = hard block.
panels.title: Gate

panels.description: Sign of (SELL distance − BUY distance): negative → BUY closer; positive → SELL closer.
panels.title: Nearest side

panels.description: Minimum of (distance to BUY, distance to SELL). Goes to 0 when a band is entered.
panels.title: Distance to next action (bps)

panels.description: Net decision this bar: -1 SELL, 0 HOLD/SKIP, +1 BUY.
panels.title: Decision (this bar)

panels.description: First applicable skip reason (if any). If trading is quiet but this says 'None', it means we're simply not in a band or below threshold.

targets.expr: sum(1 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_threshold"}) + sum(2 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_balance"}) + sum(3 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_min_notional"}) + sum(4 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_cooldown"}) + sum(5 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_gate_closed"}) + sum(6 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_delta_zero"}) + sum(7 * trade_decision{trade_decision="skip_order_error"})

panels.title: Blocker (if any)

panels.description: Signal vs static band boundaries, mimicking the ASCII bar logic. Horizontal lines show BUY/SELL entry & exit levels. Background uses thresholds to color bands.
panels.title: Signal vs bands (ascii-style view)

panels.description: How far we are from entering BUY or SELL band; 0 → inside band.
panels.title: Distances to BUY/SELL bands (bps)

panels.description: 0/1 curves for trade readiness conditions (zone, gate, delta, risk, balance, size).
panels.title: Trade readiness conditions (0/1)

panels.description: Weight delta (W) and equivalent ΔETH planned each bar.
panels.title: Planned deltas (per bar)

panels.description: ETH weight vs target.
panels.title: Exposure weights (current vs target)

panels.description: Total wealth in BTC and session PnL (BTC).
panels.title: Wealth (BTC) & PnL (BTC)

panels.description: Submission rate and rejections by reason.
panels.title: Orders / Rejections (rate, 5m)

panels.description: Latency to process a closed bar (5m moving average).
panels.title: Bar processing latency (avg over 5m)

panels.description: Why we skipped (threshold, balance, min_notional, cooldown, gate_closed, delta_zero).
panels.title: Skips by reason (5m rate)

panels.description: Mid price used by the bot.
panels.title: Mid Price (ETHBTC)

panels.description: Derived: mid × (1 − spread/2).
panels.title: Approx. Best Bid

panels.description: Derived: mid × (1 + spread/2).
panels.title: Approx. Best Ask

panels.description: Top-of-book spread proxy.
panels.title: Spread (bps)

panels.description: Price mid and derived bid/ask (last 2h).
panels.title: Mid, Approx Bid/Ask (last 2h)

panels.description: Requires bot/exporter to emit price_btc_usd.
panels.title: BTC Price (USD)

panels.description: Requires bot/exporter to emit price_eth_usd.
panels.title: ETH Price (USD)

panels.description: Shows after 24h of data is stored.
panels.title: BTC 24h Change (%)

panels.description: Shows after 24h of data is stored.
panels.title: ETH 24h Change (%)

panels.description: BTC & ETH USD prices over last 24h.
panels.title: USD Prices (last 24h)

panels.description: USD value of free balances using USD price metrics.
panels.title: Balances (USD value)
